title: Kourtney Kardashian Barker Loves This K-Beauty Line - Get 40% Off Its Glass Skin Kit
description: Parched skin and summer often go hand-in-hand. Whether it's a long flight, sun-bathing, or cocktails by the pool, this season is full of dehydration culprits. For dewy skin, we're turning to one of Kourtney Kardashian Barker's favorite skincare brands, Peach & Lily. The Korean beauty line is currently offering a 40 percent discount on their Peach & Lily Glass Skin Discovery Kit ($39, originally $65), and we're ready to stock our carry-ons. The kit offers travel sizes of their popular four-step skincare routine which cleanses, hydrates, calms, and brightens skin while protecting from skin radicals. It's created for all skin types, so whether you're battling acne or dryness, key ingredients like hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, chammomile flower extract, matcha, and peach extract will help you get your glow back. So what exactly is included? You'll get the Peach & Lily Power Calm Hydrating Cleanser ($29) (Kardashian Barker's go-to!), the Peach & Lily Wild Dew Treatment Essence ($39), the Peach & Lily Glass Skin Refining Serum ($39), and the Peach & Lily Matcha Pudding Anti-Oxidant Cream ($72). In true Kardashian Barker form, the products feature clean ingredients that are cruelty-free and vegan. Even our editors are fans (just read our Peach & Lily Glass Skin Collagen Mask review). Make sure to get your hands on a kit while supplies (and the sale!) last. Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.
